## Deployer.createToken() method

Create a new token program

**Signature:**

```typescript
createToken(tokenMetadata: TokenMetadataInput): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type               | Description                       |
| ------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| tokenMetadata | TokenMetadataInput | the metadata of the token program |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

- the address of the new token program

## Example

```jsx
const metadata = {
  name: "Token",
  symbol: "TKN",
  initialSupply: 100,
};

const address = await sdk.deployer.createToken(metadata);
```
